This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: It was a bright red square shape from behind .
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at home and was walking into my bed room and noticed a bright red light through the curtains in the sky.I first thought that it was a Helicopter . But it didn't make any sound . It looked like it had passed over the house at about 50 feet in the air . I watched it it traveled about around 300 feet or so and .It looked like it landed in the field the shape went dark . So me and my nephew went out side to take a look . It was dark , but we then seen a white light .I was bigger than a football ,but shaped like one.As it moved across the field the light went off and on . After about 4 times we though we seen enough .We went in the house.I have no resone to make this up. I didn't get much sleep that night . I have know ideal what it was . To be honest I don't want to know .
